I'm not one for writing reviews generally, but this game made me write one.

In the age of microtransactions and games as piecemeals, ehm... services, this game was refreshing beyond my expectations. A very well thought-out story with emotional weight that stays with you long after the game is finished, and a good and sometimes great gameplay elevate this game to one of the most memorable and enjoyable single player action games I've ever played in my life.

Definitely recommended, with a completely made-up (;-P ) score of 9.5 out of 10 for the base game, if I were to score it.

On the subject of DLCs, imo they are good but not great. I would suggest playing them mainly for the story.
The burial at the sea part 1 was actually the better one gameplay wise (far better I'd say), but the part 2 was heavy in story and emotions, and a nice conclusion to the bioshock trilogy/saga.

11 saatlik bir oynanışın sonunda söyleyebilirim ki hikaye bakımından gerçekten güzel ve aynı zamanda kafa karıştıran bir oyun. Oyunun atmosferi aşırı derece güzel çevre yapılandırması çok iyi grafik bakımından da çok başarılı. Ancak hikayenin gereksiz uzatılması ve tam sonuca bağlayamaması can sıkan bir durum. İlk oyunda ki hikaye örgüsü bu oyunda yok ama hikayenin konusu bu açığı kapatıyor savaş mekanikleri ve atış hissiyatı benim hoşuma gitti ama indirim bekeyip alın derim aynı zamanda rapture de geçen 2 DLC  si de var hikayeye ek olarak iyi oyunlar.

니ㅡ의 인생겜

Though this game was very well done, is free of bugs, has an interesting story, and is balanced, it was not a game I enjoyed for one primary reason - the structure of the campaign. This was similar to my experience in Bioshock 1, and is why I didn't finish the first game or even install Bioshock 2.

Often times, in a game with a linear story, that has a straightforward weapon and "magic" system, the objectives will progress in order to completion. 1 to 2 to 3 to 4. This is not an open world RPG, it is an FPS with a story. Simple and clean.

In Bioshock Infinite, there is an extreme lack of satisfaction, as many times when an objective is almost met, something will come up and divert attention entirely. This isn't to say that there is a new objective, but there are sub-objectives that must be accomplished before completing the initial objective, and this isnt discovered until the apparent moment of completion of the original objective. (Presented with 1 to 2 to 3 to 4, and told before each one is *almost* completed that there is an A, B, C, and D) 

If it were instead presented as additional objectives to be completed after the original objective is completed, that would be something else entirely. That would feel exhausting, but satisfying. (Presented as 1 to 2 to 3 to 4, and on the completion of 4, an A, B, C, and D are revealed.) 

The entire time I felt like I was being teased by some kind of fetishist and I did not enjoy it. I had heard the story was great, but it wasn't good enough to make me enjoy playing the game. Dislike, uninstalled.
Esse jogo é simplesmente incrível! Um dos melhores, vale cada centavo

[개인적인 평가]
단점
FPS게임으로 생각해보면 총쏘는 맛은 좀 떨어짐
엄청 흥미진진하고 멋있게 전투가 이루어지는건 아님
적들이 단순하고 하다보면 어디서 나올지 뻔해서 대처도 비슷하게 하게된다.
(나중에가면 애국자들이 우르르 나오는데 노잼이였다 능력4+산탄총 백어택 루프)
플레이타임이 짧다. 
(DLC나 미니게임은 안하고 스토리라인만 쭉달렸는데 10시간 소요, 하루 투자하면 가능)

장점
엘리자베스가 커엽다
일단 개취장르인 능력쓰는 하이퍼 FPS계열이고 게임이 쉽다
N버튼만 누르면 길이 맵에 나타나서 굉장히 편하다
여주인공과 같이 다니는데 자연스럽게 상호작용이 이루어진다
그래픽과 게임의 완성도가 높고, 스토리텔링도 잘된다.
스카이라인이라는 이동수단을 활용하여 전투 및 진행이 이루어져 지루하지 않음

Это уникальная и неповторимая игра на одну из самых тяжелых тем "пространственно-временного континуума". В ней есть все  (гемплей, сценарий, графений, неебическая атмосфера стимпанка и грамотно подобранная музыка, прекраная Элизабет, насыщенный деталями и диалогами мир) для того чтобы назвать ее одной из самых лучший игр во вселенной . Девиттом можешь ты не быть, но в «Биошок» сыграть обязан!

Game is too easy on hardmode. Another shooter for babies.

Died? Waifu is gonna revive you. 
Ran out of ammo? Waifu is gonna give you some. 
Need money? Waifu keeps feeding you money every 30 seconds. 
She's even giving you guns, spawns healthpackages and other recources. She's even spawning stationary or even mobile machine guns. 
wtf? 


Zero challenge. All the game has to offer is a nice companion with big eyes. That's it. Game should have been called "companion simulator". 
There is litterally no tight situations even on hard mode because whenever you get into a tight spot your companion is gonna give you what is needed. Why do i even have an ammo counter and a healthbar when depletion just means i get an animation from the companion and then am sorted out again? 
Also it makes you go through animations for receiving ammo in the middle of a firefight.
Why would they even place loot around the gameworld when my companion keeps feeding me recources anyways? 

It's not absolutely trerrible but also not worthy a recommendation. If you can pick it up for 5 bucks it's probably an OK buy for the artwork alone. This is worth 10 bucks at the most.

If you look for a challenge go look elsewhere. This a pretty looking shooter with tunnel-levels made for babies.

Pick up Dishonored or Prey instead of this one.

I don't like paying for games but I bought this one because I feel like I need to pay money to the creators for creating such a wonderfu game. lPlayed Bioshock Infinite before from a friend but bought and played it now because it so darn good. Much more than the first person shooter gameplay, what I really liked about this is the storyline. I liked how you would slowly unravel the secrets/story  and piece together everything. The story is really well thought of and would give you something to think about even after you have finished the game. 

Elizabeth is the best character ever. It's like having someone there with you in the game who not just stands there but also helps you out in the situation. Hands down to the producers for creating a video game character  to whom you will create an emotional bond with. I can only imagine the amount of time and effort they poured into making this character. I also love her song "Will the Circle be Unbroken". I am sure you will love her too. 

Gameplay is great. Good amount of weapons and upgrades for it. Vigors are also a great addition to customizing your gameplay by not only shooting and shooting. Aesthetics and sceneries are super well designed and beautiful, in columbia, rapture and the lighthouses, basically everywhere.

Burial at Sea DLC is a great addition to the game as it wraps the whole story up. This one is a bit harder for me than the main game as it requires more stealth and strategy. But nonetheless, still a great DLC.

I highly recommend this game. You'll definitely get your money's worth if you buy this game. You'll also get a lot of feels from Elizabeth if you ask me. 15/10!
good
Игра сама за себя говорит. Так как я любитель BioShock - 10/10

Не знаю как, но в данной игре идеально всё. Динамичный геймплей с использованием различных способностей, крутой арт дизайн в совокупности с яркой картинкой, ну и самый (на мой взгляд) крутой сюжет, который я видел в шутерах. Особенно доставили главные герои игры: Букер и Элизабет, за историей которых очень интересно наблюдать. Советую пройти сразу с ДЛС, так как сюжеты пересекаются. Финал игры и ДЛС может даже шокировать впечатлительного игрока. По итогу скажу, что Bioshock infinite справедливо можно назвать шедевром. 9,5/10
